item.description:
CT REIA and Al Lowry presents: Secrets For Buying Foreclosures & Other Investment Properties

Al LowryJune 20, 2011 – 5:30 to 9:00 PM
Crowne Plaza Hotel. 100 Berlin Road. Cromwell, CT
FREE for CTREIA and AOACT members | $30 for guests

Learn More and Register at www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=344

You Will Learn
* How to buy real estate below market value.
* Why the bank’s loss is your gain.
* How to locate distressed properties.
* How to research and evaluate foreclosure properties.
* How to calculate your profits.
* And much more.

About Al Lowry
Al Lowry Epitomizing the saga of “rags to riches,” Dr. Albert Lowry has risen to become America’s premier authority on real estate investing. He began fulfilling his dream by getting his real estate license and learning how to sell property. He mastered the real estate market and began creating the concepts and techniques that are the backbone of the Lowry Formula.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup
